    • Method Detail

      • checkForUpdates

        public void checkForUpdates()
                     throws PluginException
        Description copied from interface: PluginManager
        Check if there are new versions of installed plugins available.

        If updates are available and event with topic UPDATES_AVAILABLE will be posted.

        Specified by:
        checkForUpdates in interface PluginManager
        Throws:
        PluginException

      • getPluginUpdates

        public List<PluginVersions> getPluginUpdates()
                                      throws PluginException
        Description copied from interface: PluginManager
        Returns updated versions of installed plugins.

        Only plugins that the user has permission to update are returned.

        Specified by:
        getPluginUpdates in interface PluginManager
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PluginException

      • loadPlugins

        public void loadPlugins()
                 throws PluginException
        Description copied from interface: PluginManager
        Loads plugins from the system and user plugin directories.

        If the plugins are not already installed they will be installed and started.

        Specified by:
        loadPlugins in interface PluginManager
        Throws:
        PluginException
